daily_plan_req:

At 4:05 PM, delivered a speech in the common room on the future development of the virtual economy, emphasizing the importance of capital flow.
At 4:10 PM, met Carlos in the empty guest bedroom and had a fierce argument with him.
At 5 PM, concluded the family gathering and headed to the Moonlight Tavern Bar.

name: carmen ortiz
learned: carmen ortiz is a shopkeeper at Supermarket who loves to help people find the supplies they need. She is always looking for ways to make her customers feel welcome.
currently: Has her own views on the virtual economy, emphasizing the importance of capital.
